name: BasketService
description: Implementation of the basket service smart contract. The {BaskeService} smart contract receives cryptocurrencies and in exchange sends Nylon. The value of a Nylon is determined by the value of the cryptocurrencies held by this smart contract. It inherits from the ERC20 and Ownable interfaces of the openzeppelin contracts collection. Additionally, the Nylon is embed in the contract. Ownable means that someone "owns" the Nylon. This may be a person or an other smart contract. NOTE: For now, the basket service will only hold Celo.

eventDecorators.name: NylonRemoved
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when RFQ gets filled. The {NylonRemoved} event is emitted once Nylon are burnt.

eventDecorators.name: NylonTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when RFQ gets filled. The {NylonTransferred} event is emitted once Nylon are sent.

functionDecorators.name: buyNylon
functionDecorators.description: Nylon can be transferred by x-amount. These nylon are directly minted and sent to the input address. Requirements: - 'address' of the new owner, e.G. address of the basket service. {transferNylon} is only callable by the the contract owner. NOTE: To ensure that this function cannot be called by a person, the ownership should be transferred to the address of an other contract. See {ExchangeService}.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: sellNylon
functionDecorators.description: Nylon can be sold by x-amount. These nylon are directly burnt from the input address. Requirements: - 'address' of the owner. {sellNylon} is only callable by the the contract owner. NOTE: To ensure that this function cannot be called by a person, the ownership should be transferred to the address of an other contract. See {ExchangeService}.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
